title.narrative: Myanmar adopted new TDMP guideline in all townships The mechanism, SOP/ framework for Post -Earthquake Rapid Damage Assessment is in place Government authority improved knowledge and established mechanism on use of Earth Observation Technology (EOT)

baseline.value: Old TDMP guideline from 2010 No tool and methodology for post-earthquake rapid damage assessment of buildings. No mechanism to utilize the available resources
